query.statement:
MERGE INTO QICS213 T USING ( SELECT A.SEQ_T300 , A.SEQ_Q100 , A.FORM_SEQ , A.PAGE_ORDER , A.FIELD_NAME , A.USER_LAST_VALUE FROM ( SELECT NULL AS SEQ_T300 , NULL AS SEQ_Q100 , NULL AS FORM_SEQ , NULL AS PAGE_ORDER , NULL AS FIELD_NAME , NULL AS USER_LAST_VALUE #foreach( $rm in $mergeRows ) UNION ALL SELECT LTRIM( '$rm.SEQ_T300' ) AS SEQ_T300 , LTRIM( '$rm.SEQ_Q100' ) AS SEQ_Q100 , LTRIM( '$rm.FORM_SEQ' ) AS FORM_SEQ , LTRIM( '$rm.PAGE_ORDER' ) AS PAGE_ORDER , LTRIM( '$rm.FIELD_NAME' ) AS FIELD_NAME , LTRIM( '$rm.USER_LAST_VALUE' ) AS USER_LAST_VALUE
#end ) A WHERE SEQ_T300 IS NOT NULL ) S ON ( T.SEQ_T300 = S.SEQ_T300 AND T.PAGE_ORDER = S.PAGE_ORDER AND T.FIELD_NAME = S.FIELD_NAME) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET T.USER_LAST_VALUE = ( CASE WHEN S.USER_LAST_VALUE='' THEN ( CASE WHEN T.USER_INPUT_VALUE IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE S.USER_LAST_VALUE END ) ELSE S.USER_LAST_VALUE END ) WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( SEQ_T300 , SEQ_Q100 , FORM_SEQ , PAGE_ORDER , FIELD_NAME , USER_LAST_VALUE ) VALUES ( S.SEQ_T300 , S.SEQ_Q100 , S.FORM_SEQ , S.PAGE_ORDER , S.FIELD_NAME , S.USER_LAST_VALUE );

UPDATE TDPP300 SET POC_NO = :POC_NO, POC_NO01 = :C_POC_NO01_POD, POC_NO02 = :C_POC_NO02_POD, POC_NO03 = :C_POC_NO03_POD, WORK_DATE = :C_CHK_DT, C_CHK_NO = :C_CHK_NO, C_CHKER = :C_CHKER, NG_CODE =:NG_CODE, C_STD01 =:C_STD01, C_STD02 =:C_STD02, C_LEN =:C_LEN, C_PP =:C_PP, C_LV = :C_LV WHERE SEQ_T300=:SEQ_T300 AND SEQ_Q100=:SEQ_Q100
UPDATE QICS100 SET POC_NO = :POC_NO, POC_NO01 = :C_POC_NO01_POD, POC_NO02 = :C_POC_NO02_POD, POC_NO03 = :C_POC_NO03_POD, WORK_DATE = :C_CHK_DT WHERE SEQ_T300=:SEQ_T300 AND SEQ_Q100=:SEQ_Q100

INSERT INTO BOL_QA_MQC_COIL_MST ( SEQ_Q100, SEQ_T300, COLLECTION_ID, ORGANIZATION_ID, POC_NUMBER, OPERATION_SEQ_NUM, OPERATION_RESOURCE, INSPECTION_DATE, INSPECTOR, STEEL_KIND, GRADE_RESULT, THICKNESS, WIDTH, MFG_WEIGHT, TOTAL_LENGTH, WIDTH_RESULT, TICKNESS_STANDARD, TICKNESS_RESULT, TICKNESS_SPEC_RANGE, GRADE, SURFACE_Q, GRADE_SURFACE, ROLL_STOP, CREATION_DATE, CREATED_BY, LAST_UPDATE_DATE, LAST_UPDATED_BY, LAST_UPDATE_LOGIN, POP_TRANSACTION_ID, OPERATOR, TRANSACTION_ID, WORK_DATE, WORK_TEAM, RESOURCE_CODE, ITEM_CODE, INVENTORY_ITEM_ID, ORDER_NUMBER, LINE_NUMBER, OP_START_DATE, ORDER_USAGE_CODE, ORDER_USAGE_DESC, ORDER_USAGE_END_USER_CODE, MAIN_NG_CODE, NG_QUANTITY, HEAT_POC_NUMBER, STEEL_CODE, ROLL_STOP1, ROLL_STOP2, ROLL_STOP3, ROLL_STOP4, ROLL_STOP5, ROLL_STOP6, ROLL_STOP7, ANN_ST, JUDG ) VALUES ( :SEQ_Q100, :SEQ_T300, :COLLECTION_ID, :ORGANIZATION_ID, :POC_NO, :OPERATION_SEQ_NUM, :IN_LINE, :WORK_DATE, :C_CHK_NO, :C_STP, :C_LV, :THICKNESS, :WIDTH, :MFG_WEIGHT, :C_LEN, :C_MSW02, :TICKNESS_STANDARD, :C_MST02, #if($TICKNESS_RANGE && !$TICKNESS_RANGE.equals("")) :TICKNESS_RANGE, #else :TICKNESS_SPEC_RANGE, #end :C_PP, :C_BEST_VALUE, :C_SKIN, :C_ROLL_STOP01, getdate(), '-1', getdate(), '-1', '-1', :POP_TRANSACTION_ID, :C_CHK_NO, :TRANSACTION_ID, :WORKDATE, :WORK_TEAM, :RESOURCE_CODE, :ITEM_CODE, :INVENTORY_ITEM_ID, :ORDER_NUMBER, :LINE_NUMBER, :OP_START_DATE, :ORDER_USAGE_CODE, :ORDER_USAGE_DESC, :ORDER_USAGE_END_USER_CODE, :NG_CODE, :NG_QUANTITY, :HEAT_POC_NUMBER, :STEEL_CODE, :C_ROLL_STOP02, :C_ROLL_STOP03, :C_ROLL_STOP04, :C_ROLL_STOP05, :C_ROLL_STOP06, :C_ROLL_STOP07, :C_ROLL_STOP08, :C_ANN_ST, (SELECT USER_LAST_VALUE FROM TDPP300 A INNER JOIN QICS213 B ON A.SEQ_Q100 = B.SEQ_Q100 AND A.SEQ_T300 = B.SEQ_T300 AND FIELD_NAME = 'C_JUDG' WHERE A.SEQ_Q100 = :SEQ_Q100 AND A.FORM_TYPE = 'R') )

INSERT INTO BOL_QA_MQC_COIL_DETAIL1 ( SEQ_Q100, SEQ_T300, COLLECTION_ID, NG_CODE_ID, SURFACE_B, SURFACE_C, SURFACE_D, SURFACE_K, REAR_B, REAR_C, REAR_D, REAR_K, CREATION_DATE, CREATED_BY, LAST_UPDATE_DATE, LAST_UPDATED_BY, LAST_UPDATE_LOGIN ) SELECT S.SEQ_Q100, S.SEQ_T300, S.COLLECTION_ID, S.NG_CODE_ID, S.SURFACE_B, S.SURFACE_C, S.SURFACE_D, S.SURFACE_K, S.REAR_B, S.REAR_C, S.REAR_D, S.REAR_K, getdate() AS CREATION_DATE, '-1' AS CREATED_BY, getdate() AS LAST_UPDATE_DATE, '-1' AS LAST_UPDATED_BY, '-1' AS LAST_UPDATE_LOGIN FROM ( SELECT NULL AS SEQ_Q100, NULL AS SEQ_T300, NULL AS COLLECTION_ID, NULL AS NG_CODE_ID, NULL AS SURFACE_B, NULL AS SURFACE_C, NULL AS SURFACE_D, NULL AS SURFACE_K, NULL AS REAR_B, NULL AS REAR_C, NULL AS REAR_D, NULL AS REAR_K #foreach( $rm in $insertRows ) UNION ALL SELECT LTRIM('$rm.SEQ_Q100') AS SEQ_Q100, LTRIM('$rm.SEQ_T300') AS SEQ_T300, LTRIM('$rm.COLLECTION_ID') AS COLLECTION_ID, LTRIM('$rm.code') AS NG_CODE_ID, LTRIM('$rm.SB') AS SURFACE_B, LTRIM('$rm.SC') AS SURFACE_C, LTRIM('$rm.SD') AS SURFACE_D, LTRIM('$rm.SK') AS SURFACE_K, LTRIM('$rm.RB') AS REAR_B, LTRIM('$rm.RC') AS REAR_C, LTRIM('$rm.RD') AS REAR_D, LTRIM('$rm.RK') AS REAR_K #end )S WHERE S.SEQ_T300 IS NOT NULL

INSERT INTO BOL_QA_MQC_COIL_DETAIL2 ( SEQ_Q100, SEQ_T300, COLLECTION_ID, COLLECT_TYPE, M_START, M_END, CREATION_DATE, CREATED_BY, LAST_UPDATE_DATE, LAST_UPDATED_BY, LAST_UPDATE_LOGIN ) SELECT S.SEQ_Q100, S.SEQ_T300, S.COLLECTION_ID, S.COLLECT_TYPE, S.M_START, S.M_END, getdate() AS CREATION_DATE, '-1' AS CREATED_BY, getdate() AS LAST_UPDATE_DATE, '-1' AS LAST_UPDATED_BY, '-1' AS LAST_UPDATE_LOGIN FROM ( SELECT NULL AS SEQ_Q100, NULL AS SEQ_T300, NULL AS COLLECTION_ID, NULL AS COLLECT_TYPE, NULL AS M_START, NULL AS M_END #foreach( $rm in $insertRows ) UNION ALL SELECT LTRIM('$rm.SEQ_Q100') AS SEQ_Q100, LTRIM('$rm.SEQ_T300') AS SEQ_T300, LTRIM('$rm.COLLECTION_ID') AS COLLECTION_ID, LTRIM('$rm.COLLECT_TYPE') AS NG_CODE_ID, #if($rm.M_START && !$rm.M_START.equals("") ) LTRIM('$rm.M_START') AS M_START, #else NULL AS M_START, #end
#if($rm.M_END && !$rm.M_END.equals("") ) LTRIM('$rm.M_END') AS M_END #else NULL AS M_END #end
#end )S WHERE S.SEQ_T300 IS NOT NULL

INSERT INTO BOL_QA_MQC_COIL_DETAIL3 ( SEQ_Q100, SEQ_T300, COLLECTION_ID, A1, A2, A3, A4, A5, A6, A7, A8, A9, A10, A11, A12, A13, A14, A15, A16, A17, A18, B1, B2, B3, B4, B5, B6, B7, B8, B9, B10, B11, B12, B13, B14, B15, B16, B17, B18, C1, C2, C3, C4, C5, C6, C7, C8, C9, C10, C11, C12, C13, C14, C15, C16, C17, C18, D1, D2, D3, D4, D5, D6, D7, D8, D9, D10, D11, D12, D13, D14, D15, D16, D17, D18, E1, E2, E3, E4, E5, E6, E7, E8, E9, E10, E11, E12, E13, E14, E15, E16, E17, E18, F1, F2, F3, F4, F5, F6, F7, F8, F9, F10, F11, F12, F13, F14, F15, F16, F17, F18, G1, G2, G3, G4, G5, G6, G7, G8, G9, G10, CREATION_DATE, LAST_UPDATED_BY, LAST_UPDATE_DATE, LAST_UPDATE_LOGIN ) VALUES ( :SEQ_Q100, :SEQ_T300, :COLLECTION_ID, :C_MSP01, :C_MSP02, :C_MSP03, :C_MSP04, :C_MSP05, :C_MSP06, :C_MSP07, :C_MSP08, :C_MSP09, :C_MSP10, :C_MSP11, :C_MSP12, :C_MSP13, :C_MSP14, :C_MSP15, :C_MSP16, :C_MSP17, :C_MSP18, :C_MST01, :C_MST02, :C_MST03, :C_MST04, :C_MST05, :C_MST06, :C_MST07, :C_MST08, :C_MST09, :C_MST10, :C_MST11, :C_MST12, :C_MST13, :C_MST14, :C_MST15, :C_MST16, :C_MST17, :C_MST18, :C_MSW01, :C_MSW02, :C_MSW03, :C_MSW04, :C_MSW05, :C_MSW06, :C_MSW07, :C_MSW08, :C_MSW09, :C_MSW10, :C_MSW11, :C_MSW12, :C_MSW13, :C_MSW14, :C_MSW15, :C_MSW16, :C_MSW17, :C_MSW18, :C_M01, :C_M02, :C_M03, :C_M04, :C_M05, :C_M06, :C_M07, :C_M08, :C_M09, :C_M10, :C_M11, :C_M12, :C_M13, :C_M14, :C_M15, :C_M16, :C_M17, :C_M18, :C_SH01, :C_SH02, :C_SH03, :C_SH04, :C_SH05, :C_SH06, :C_SH07, :C_SH08, :C_SH09, :C_SH10, :C_SH11, :C_SH12, :C_SH13, :C_SH14, :C_SH15, :C_SH16, :C_SH17, :C_SH18, :C_ST01, :C_ST02, :C_ST03, :C_ST04, :C_ST05, :C_ST06, :C_ST07, :C_ST08, :C_ST09, :C_ST10, :C_ST11, :C_ST12, :C_ST13, :C_ST14, :C_ST15, :C_ST16, :C_ST17, :C_ST18, :C_RH01, :C_RH02, :C_RH03, :C_RH04, :C_RH05, :C_RH06, :C_RH07, :C_RH08, :C_RH09, :C_RH10, :C_RH11, :C_RH12, :C_RH13, :C_RH14, :C_RH15, :C_RH16, :C_RH17, :C_RH18, :C_RT01, :C_RT02, :C_RT03, :C_RT04, :C_RT05, :C_RT06, :C_RT07, :C_RT08, :C_RT09, :C_RT10, :C_RT11, :C_RT12, :C_RT13, :C_RT14, :C_RT15, :C_RT16, :C_RT17, :C_RT18, :SC, :SD, :SK, :ST, :SCP, :SDP, :SKP, :STP, :RC, :RD, :RK, :RT, :RCP, :RDP, :RKP, :RTP, getdate(), '-1', getdate(), '-1', '-1' )

SELECT INS_GUBUN, (CASE WHEN ISNULL(COLLECTION_ID, '') = '' THEN '' ELSE COLLECTION_ID END) AS COLLECTION_ID, STEEL, OPERATION_SEQ_NUM, MFG_WEIGHT, TRANSACTION_ID, STEEL_CODE, WIDTH, THICKNESS, ORDER_NUMBER, LINE_NUMBER, ORDER_USAGE_CODE, ORDER_USAGE_CODE_DESC, ORDER_USAGE_END_USER_CODE, ORDER_USAGE_DESC, HEAT_POC_NUMBER, INVENTORY_ITEM_ID, TICKNESS_STANDARD, WORKDATE, WORK_TEAM, WIP_RESOURCE_CODE, ITEM_CODE, OP_START_DATE, '' AS POP_TRANSACTION_ID, '' AS RESOURCE_CODE, CREATION_DATE, CREATED_BY, LAST_UPDATE_DATE, LAST_UPDATED_BY, LAST_UPDATE_LOGIN FROM HB_QM_UFS_IF_INSPECTION WHERE UFS_PAGE_ID='TEMP01'
DELETE FROM BOL_QA_MQC_COIL_MST WHERE SEQ_Q100 = :SEQ_Q100 AND SEQ_T300 = :SEQ_T300
DELETE FROM BOL_QA_MQC_COIL_DETAIL1 WHERE SEQ_Q100 = :SEQ_Q100 AND SEQ_T300 = :SEQ_T300
DELETE FROM BOL_QA_MQC_COIL_DETAIL2 WHERE SEQ_Q100 = :SEQ_Q100 AND SEQ_T300 = :SEQ_T300
DELETE FROM BOL_QA_MQC_COIL_DETAIL3 WHERE SEQ_Q100 = :SEQ_Q100 AND SEQ_T300 = :SEQ_T300

UPDATE BOL_QA_MQC_COIL_MST SET COLLECTION_ID =:COLLECTION_ID ,OPERATION_SEQ_NUM=:OPERATION_SEQ_NUM ,THICKNESS=:THICKNESS ,WIDTH=:WIDTH ,MFG_WEIGHT=:MFG_WEIGHT ,TICKNESS_STANDARD=:TICKNESS_STANDARD ,TRANSACTION_ID=:TRANSACTION_ID ,WORK_DATE=:WORK_DATE ,WORK_TEAM=:WORK_TEAM ,RESOURCE_CODE=:WIP_RESOURCE_CODE ,TICKNESS_SPEC_RANGE=(CASE WHEN TICKNESS_SPEC_RANGE IS NULL THEN :TICKNESS_SPEC_RANGE ELSE TICKNESS_SPEC_RANGE END) ,ITEM_CODE=:ITEM_CODE ,INVENTORY_ITEM_ID=:INVENTORY_ITEM_ID ,ORDER_NUMBER=:ORDER_NUMBER ,LINE_NUMBER=:LINE_NUMBER ,OP_START_DATE=:OP_START_DATE ,ORDER_USAGE_CODE=:ORDER_USAGE_CODE ,ORDER_USAGE_DESC=:ORDER_USAGE_DESC ,ORDER_USAGE_END_USER_CODE=:ORDER_USAGE_END_USER_CODE ,HEAT_POC_NUMBER=:HEAT_POC_NUMBER ,STEEL_CODE=:STEEL_CODE WHERE SEQ_Q100 = :SEQ_Q100 AND SEQ_T300 = :SEQ_T300
UPDATE BOL_QA_MQC_COIL_DETAIL1 SET COLLECTION_ID =:COLLECTION_ID WHERE SEQ_Q100 = :SEQ_Q100 AND SEQ_T300 = :SEQ_T300
UPDATE BOL_QA_MQC_COIL_DETAIL2 SET COLLECTION_ID =:COLLECTION_ID WHERE SEQ_Q100 = :SEQ_Q100 AND SEQ_T300 = :SEQ_T300
UPDATE BOL_QA_MQC_COIL_DETAIL3 SET COLLECTION_ID =:COLLECTION_ID WHERE SEQ_Q100 = :SEQ_Q100 AND SEQ_T300 = :SEQ_T300
SELECT * FROM BOL_QA_MQC_COIL_MST WHERE SEQ_Q100 = :SEQ_Q100 AND SEQ_T300 = :SEQ_T300
SELECT * FROM BOL_QA_MQC_COIL_DETAIL1 WHERE SEQ_Q100 = :SEQ_Q100 AND SEQ_T300 = :SEQ_T300
SELECT * FROM BOL_QA_MQC_COIL_DETAIL2 WHERE SEQ_Q100 = :SEQ_Q100 AND SEQ_T300 = :SEQ_T300
SELECT * FROM BOL_QA_MQC_COIL_DETAIL3 WHERE SEQ_Q100 = :SEQ_Q100 AND SEQ_T300 = :SEQ_T300

INSERT INTO BOL_QA_LQC_COIL_RESULTS ( SEQ_Q100, SEQ_T300, COLLECTION_ID, ORGANIZATION_ID, POC_NUMBER, OPERATION_RESOURCE, INSPECTION_DATE, INSPECTOR, WEIGHT, TICKNESS, WIDTH, LENGTH, SURFACE, COATING, OK_NG, GRADE, NG_CODE, TICKNESS_STANDARD, CREATION_DATE, CREATED_BY, LAST_UPDATE_DATE, LAST_UPDATED_BY, LAST_UPDATE_LOGIN, OPERATOR, ORDER_DELIVERY, OK_SURFACE, OK_GRADE, MILLEDGE_GBN, IO_GBN, CROWN_OP, CROWN_OC, CROWN_CE, CROWN_DC, CROWN_DR, SAMPLE_POSITION, ORDER_USAGE_CODE, ORDER_USAGE_DESC, ORDER_USAGE_END_USER_CODE, STEEL_CODE, STEEL_DESC, INVENTORY_ITEM_ID, HEAT_POC_NUMBER, ITEM_THICKNESS, ITEM_WIDTH, HOOP_OK, PRESENCE, GOLD_DUST, SPECIAL_APPOINTMENT, ROLL_STOP, ROLL_STOP1, ROLL_STOP2, ROLL_STOP3, ROLL_STOP4, ROLL_STOP5, ROLL_STOP6, ROLL_STOP7 ) VALUES ( :SEQ_Q100, :SEQ_T300, :COLLECTION_ID, :ORGANIZATION_ID, :POC_NO, :IN_LINE, :WORK_DATE, :C_CHK_NO, :MGT_WEIGHT, :C_MST02, :C_MSW02, :C_LEN, :C_SKIN, :C_COAT_VALUE, 'N', :C_LV, :C_MDCODE, :TICKNESS_STANDARD, getdate(), '-1', getdate(), '-1', '-1', :C_CHK_NO, :ORDER_DELIVERY, :C_ASKIN, :C_ALV, :MILLEDGE_GBN, :C_BEST_VALUE, :C_OP11, :C_OP12, :C_OP13, :C_OP14, :C_OP15, :C_SMPL01, :ORDER_USAGE_CODE, :ORDER_USAGE_DESC, :ORDER_USAGE_END_USER_CODE, :C_STP_NM, :C_STP, :INVENTORY_ITEM_ID, :HEAT_POC_NUMBER, :TARGET_THICKNESS, :LAST_WIDTH, :C_HOOP_VALUE, :PRESENCE, :GOLD_DUST, :SPECIAL_APPOINTMENT, :C_ROLL_STOP01, :C_ROLL_STOP02, :C_ROLL_STOP03, :C_ROLL_STOP04, :C_ROLL_STOP05, :C_ROLL_STOP06, :C_ROLL_STOP07, :C_ROLL_STOP08 )

UPDATE BOL_QA_LQC_COIL_RESULTS SET COLLECTION_ID =:COLLECTION_ID ,TICKNESS_STANDARD=:TICKNESS_STANDARD ,ORDER_USAGE_CODE=:ORDER_USAGE_CODE ,ORDER_USAGE_DESC=:ORDER_USAGE_DESC ,ORDER_USAGE_END_USER_CODE=:ORDER_USAGE_END_USER_CODE ,STEEL_CODE=(CASE WHEN STEEL_CODE IS NULL THEN :STEEL_CODE ELSE STEEL_CODE END) ,STEEL_DESC=(CASE WHEN STEEL_DESC IS NULL THEN :STEEL ELSE STEEL_DESC END) ,INVENTORY_ITEM_ID=:INVENTORY_ITEM_ID ,WEIGHT = :MFG_WEIGHT ,HEAT_POC_NUMBER=:HEAT_POC_NUMBER WHERE SEQ_Q100 = :SEQ_Q100 AND SEQ_T300 = :SEQ_T300
DELETE FROM BOL_QA_LQC_COIL_RESULTS WHERE SEQ_Q100 = :SEQ_Q100 AND SEQ_T300 = :SEQ_T300

INSERT INTO BOL_QA_ME_COIL_RESULTS ( SEQ_Q100, SEQ_T300, POC_NUMBER, INSPECTION_DATE, ORGANIZATION_ID, STEEL, SURFACE, THICKNESS, WIDTH, GRADE, INS_POSITION1, INS_POSITION2, INS_POSITION3, INS_POSITION4, INS_POSITION5, INS_POSITION6, INS_POSITION7, INS_POSITION8, INS_POSITION9, INS_POSITION10, INS_POSITION11, INS_POSITION12, INS_POSITION13, INS_POSITION14, INS_POSITION15, F15, F16, F17, F18, G1, G2, G3, G4, G5, G6, G7, G8, G9, G10, G11, G12, G13, G14, G15, G16, G17, G18, H1, H2, H3, H4, H5, H6, H7, H8, H9, H10, H11, H12, H13, H14, H15, H16, H17, H18, ROLL_STOP, ROLL_STOP1, ROLL_STOP2, ROLL_STOP3, ROLL_STOP4, ROLL_STOP5, ROLL_STOP6, ROLL_STOP7, INVENTORY_ITEM_ID, ORDER_NUMBER, LINE_NUMBER, HEAT_POC_NUMBER, INSPECTOR, ITEM_CODE, CREATION_DATE, CREATED_BY, LAST_UPDATE_DATE, LAST_UPDATED_BY, LAST_UPDATE_LOGIN, STEEL_CODE, COIL_LENGTH, CERTIFIED_SURFACE, COILLING_RANGE ) VALUES ( :SEQ_Q100, :SEQ_T300, :POC_NO, :WORK_DATE, :ORGANIZATION_ID, :C_STP, :C_SKIN, :TARGET_THICKNESS, :LAST_WIDTH, :C_LV, :C_MSP01, :C_MSP02, :C_MSP03, :C_MSP04, :C_MSP05, :C_MSP06, :C_MSP07, :C_MSP08, :C_MSP09, :C_MSP10, :C_MSP11, :C_MSP12, :C_MSP13, :C_MSP14, :C_MSP15, :C_ST12, :C_ST13, :C_ST14, :C_ST15, :C_ST16, :C_ST17, :C_ST18, :C_RH01, :C_RH02, :C_RH03, :C_RH04, :C_RH05, :C_RH06, :C_RH07, :C_RH08, :C_RH09, :C_RH10, :C_RH11, :C_RH12, :C_RH13, :C_RH14, :C_RH15, :C_ROLL_STOP01, :C_ROLL_STOP02, :C_ROLL_STOP03, :C_ROLL_STOP04, :C_ROLL_STOP05, :C_ROLL_STOP06, :C_ROLL_STOP07, :C_ROLL_STOP08, :INVENTORY_ITEM_ID, :ORDER_NUMBER, :LINE_NUMBER, :HEAT_POC_NUMBER, :C_CHK_NO, :ITEM_CODE, getdate(), '-1', getdate(), '-1', '-1', :STEEL_CODE, :C_LEN, :C_BEST_VALUE, :C_COIL_ST01 + '~' + :C_COIL_ED01 )

INSERT INTO BOL_QA_LQC_COIL_DETAIL1 ( SEQ_Q100, SEQ_T300, COLLECTION_ID, NG_CODE_ID, SURFACE_B, SURFACE_C, SURFACE_D, SURFACE_K, REAR_B, REAR_C, REAR_D, REAR_K, CREATION_DATE, CREATED_BY, LAST_UPDATE_DATE, LAST_UPDATED_BY, LAST_UPDATE_LOGIN ) SELECT S.SEQ_Q100, S.SEQ_T300, S.COLLECTION_ID, S.NG_CODE_ID, S.SURFACE_B, S.SURFACE_C, S.SURFACE_D, S.SURFACE_K, S.REAR_B, S.REAR_C, S.REAR_D, S.REAR_K, getdate() AS CREATION_DATE, '-1' AS CREATED_BY, getdate() AS LAST_UPDATE_DATE, '-1' AS LAST_UPDATED_BY, '-1' AS LAST_UPDATE_LOGIN FROM ( SELECT NULL AS SEQ_Q100, NULL AS SEQ_T300, NULL AS COLLECTION_ID, NULL AS NG_CODE_ID, NULL AS SURFACE_B, NULL AS SURFACE_C, NULL AS SURFACE_D, NULL AS SURFACE_K, NULL AS REAR_B, NULL AS REAR_C, NULL AS REAR_D, NULL AS REAR_K #foreach( $rm in $insertRows ) UNION ALL SELECT LTRIM('$rm.SEQ_Q100') AS SEQ_Q100, LTRIM('$rm.SEQ_T300') AS SEQ_T300, LTRIM('$rm.COLLECTION_ID') AS COLLECTION_ID, LTRIM('$rm.code') AS NG_CODE_ID, LTRIM('$rm.SB') AS SURFACE_B, LTRIM('$rm.SC') AS SURFACE_C, LTRIM('$rm.SD') AS SURFACE_D, LTRIM('$rm.SK') AS SURFACE_K, LTRIM('$rm.RB') AS REAR_B, LTRIM('$rm.RC') AS REAR_C, LTRIM('$rm.RD') AS REAR_D, LTRIM('$rm.RK') AS REAR_K #end )S WHERE S.SEQ_T300 IS NOT NULL

INSERT INTO BOL_QA_LQC_COIL_DETAIL2 ( SEQ_Q100, SEQ_T300, COLLECTION_ID, COLLECT_TYPE, M_START, M_END, CREATION_DATE, CREATED_BY, LAST_UPDATE_DATE, LAST_UPDATED_BY, LAST_UPDATE_LOGIN ) SELECT S.SEQ_Q100, S.SEQ_T300, S.COLLECTION_ID, S.COLLECT_TYPE, S.M_START, S.M_END, getdate() AS CREATION_DATE, '-1' AS CREATED_BY, getdate() AS LAST_UPDATE_DATE, '-1' AS LAST_UPDATED_BY, '-1' AS LAST_UPDATE_LOGIN FROM ( SELECT NULL AS SEQ_Q100, NULL AS SEQ_T300, NULL AS COLLECTION_ID, NULL AS COLLECT_TYPE, NULL AS M_START, NULL AS M_END #foreach( $rm in $insertRows ) UNION ALL SELECT LTRIM('$rm.SEQ_Q100') AS SEQ_Q100, LTRIM('$rm.SEQ_T300') AS SEQ_T300, LTRIM('$rm.COLLECTION_ID') AS COLLECTION_ID, LTRIM('$rm.COLLECT_TYPE') AS NG_CODE_ID, #if($rm.M_START && !$rm.M_START.equals("") ) LTRIM('$rm.M_START') AS M_START, #else NULL AS M_START, #end
#if($rm.M_END && !$rm.M_END.equals("") ) LTRIM('$rm.M_END') AS M_END #else NULL AS M_END #end
#end )S WHERE S.SEQ_T300 IS NOT NULL

UPDATE BOL_QA_ME_COIL_RESULTS SET STEEL =:STEEL ,THICKNESS=:TARGET_THICKNESS ,WIDTH=:LAST_WIDTH ,INVENTORY_ITEM_ID=:INVENTORY_ITEM_ID ,ORDER_NUMBER=:ORDER_NUMBER ,LINE_NUMBER=:LINE_NUMBER ,HEAT_POC_NUMBER=:HEAT_POC_NUMBER ,ITEM_CODE=:ITEM_CODE WHERE SEQ_Q100 = :SEQ_Q100 AND SEQ_T300 = :SEQ_T300
DELETE FROM BOL_QA_ME_COIL_RESULTS WHERE SEQ_Q100 = :SEQ_Q100 AND SEQ_T300 = :SEQ_T300
DELETE FROM BOL_QA_LQC_COIL_DETAIL1 WHERE SEQ_Q100 = :SEQ_Q100 AND SEQ_T300 = :SEQ_T300
DELETE FROM BOL_QA_LQC_COIL_DETAIL2 WHERE SEQ_Q100 = :SEQ_Q100 AND SEQ_T300 = :SEQ_T300
DELETE FROM BOL_QA_LQC_COIL_DETAIL3 WHERE SEQ_Q100 = :SEQ_Q100 AND SEQ_T300 = :SEQ_T300
UPDATE BOL_QA_LQC_COIL_DETAIL1 SET COLLECTION_ID =:COLLECTION_ID WHERE SEQ_Q100 = :SEQ_Q100 AND SEQ_T300 = :SEQ_T300
UPDATE BOL_QA_LQC_COIL_DETAIL2 SET COLLECTION_ID =:COLLECTION_ID WHERE SEQ_Q100 = :SEQ_Q100 AND SEQ_T300 = :SEQ_T300
UPDATE BOL_QA_LQC_COIL_DETAIL3 SET COLLECTION_ID =:COLLECTION_ID WHERE SEQ_Q100 = :SEQ_Q100 AND SEQ_T300 = :SEQ_T300

SELECT * FROM BOL_QA_LQC_COIL_DETAIL3 WHERE SEQ_Q100 = :SEQ_Q100 AND SEQ_T300 = :SEQ_T300
SELECT * FROM BOL_QA_ME_COIL_RESULTS WHERE SEQ_Q100 = :SEQ_Q100 AND SEQ_T300 = :SEQ_T300
SELECT * FROM BOL_QA_ME_COIL_RESULTS WHERE SEQ_Q100 = :SEQ_Q100 AND SEQ_T300 = :SEQ_T300
update tdpp300 set ERP_UPLOAD_YN=NULL ,END_YN=NULL where SEQ_T300 = :SEQ_T300
update qics100 set STATUS_CODE='S' where SEQ_Q100 = :SEQ_Q100
update tdpp300 set ERP_UPLOAD_YN='Y' ,END_YN='Y' where SEQ_T300 = :SEQ_T300
update qics100 set STATUS_CODE='C' where SEQ_Q100 = :SEQ_Q100
UPDATE QICS213 SET USER_LAST_VALUE = :C_JUDG WHERE SEQ_T300 = :SEQ_T300 AND FIELD_NAME = 'C_JUDG'
